Description: Billion Auto Fze is a professional car dealer in Dubai. It's a subsidiary company of GT Group, the leader in car import and export industry in China for more than 10 years.We are now hiring experienced car sales representatives to sell new and used cars from China, especially electric vehicles (EV).The main brand we are now selling is Tesla, imported from China.Skills
Skills:
At least 2 years relevant experience is preferred.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to build and maintain customer relationships
Valid UAE driver's license (required)
